price: 17. Maalkooda ama awlaaddoodu waxna ugama taraan Alle Xaggiisa, kuwaasi waa ehlu Naar, way ku dhex waari weligood.
arabic: لَّن تُغۡنِيَ عَنۡهُمۡ أَمۡوَٰلُهُمۡ وَلَآ أَوۡلَٰدُهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيۡـًٔاۚ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلنَّارِۖ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: lan tugh'niya ʿanhum amwāluhum walā awlāduhum mina al-lahi shayan ulāika aṣḥābu al-nāri hum fīhā khālidūna
